CopyObject.Name: SqlServer
CopyObject.PreCopySql: exec sp_msforeachtable 'ALTER TABLE ? NOCHECK CONSTRAINT all'; exec sp_msforeachtable 'ALTER TABLE ? DISABLE TRIGGER all';
CopyObject.PostCopySql: exec sp_msforeachtable 'ALTER TABLE ? CHECK CONSTRAINT all'; exec sp_msforeachtable 'ALTER TABLE ? ENABLE TRIGGER all';
CopyObject.ListSql: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables where table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
CopyObject.ListSql-old: SELECT '[' + table_schema + '].[' + table_name + ']' as table_name FROM information_schema.tables where table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

CopyObject.Name: Oracle
CopyObject.ListSql: select owner as table_schema, object_name as table_name from all_objects where object_type in ('TABLE', 'VIEW') and owner not in ('SYS', 'OUTLN', 'SYSTEM') and temporary = 'N'
